articles.author: Anirudh Singh
articles.title: World Cup 2023 [WATCH]: Glenn Maxwell caught smoking e-cigarette in the dressing room during Australia's big defeat against South Africa - Cricket Times
articles.description: Glenn Maxwell caught vaping e-cigarette in dressing room during Australia vs South Africa clash at the ongoing ODI World Cup. Australia lost the match by a record margin of 134 runs.
articles.content: There was a stir in the cricketing world on Thursday when Australian all-rounder Glenn Maxwell was caught smoking an e-cigarette in the dressing room during Australia’s record defeat against South Af… [+2481 chars]
